hero.title: Conquer the Rapids, Preserve Nature
hero.subtitle: The official federation for rafting in Indonesia, fostering athletes and sustainable tourism.

about.title: About FAJI
about.subtitle: Building Achievement & Preserving Nature
about.description: The Indonesia Rafting Federation (FAJI) is the governing body for rafting in Indonesia, dedicated to advancing the sport for achievement, recreation, and river conservation.

achievement.title: World Class Achievement
achievement.desc: Producing international-class athletes who make the nation proud.

conservation.title: River Guardians
conservation.desc: The front line in preserving Indonesia's river ecosystems.

visiMisi.title: Vision & Mission
visiMisi.content: To establish rafting as a premier sport with international achievements, while pioneering river conservation and the development of sustainable adventure tourism.

map.title: FAJI Membership Distribution
map.subtitle: National Reach
map.description: FAJI is present in 34 provinces across Indonesia, uniting rafting communities from Sabang to Merauke.

program.title: Featured Programs
program.subtitle: National Agenda
program.description: Explore our various programs designed for athletes, enthusiasts, and nature lovers.

competition.title: National Championship
competition.desc: National level competitions to scout top athletes.

training.title: Guide Certification
training.desc: Competency standardization for rafting tourism safety.

conservation.title: River Conservation
conservation.desc: Real action to maintain the cleanliness and sustainability of Indonesian rivers.

tourism.title: Rafting Tourism
tourism.desc: Development of safe and sustainable river tourism destinations.

scouting.title: Talent Scouting
scouting.desc: Early childhood development program for national athlete regeneration.

gallery.title: Activity Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Best Moments
gallery.description: Documentation from various activities, championships, and river expeditions.

live.title: Live Stream
live.description: Watch Indonesia's best athletes battle the rapids live.

footer.description: Building national character through whitewater sports.

LivePage.title: FAJI Live Stream
LivePage.description: Hub for live broadcasts of FAJI championships and events.
